The ways of writing functions in JavaScript

2023/12
  1. Function declaration
function foo(p1, ..., pn) {
  // ...
}
  • Bound to a named hoisted variable
  • Can be used before declaration
  • Name appears in the call stack
  1. Function expressions

2.1. Anonymous function expression

const fn = function(p1, ..., pn) {
  // ...
}

2.2. Named function expression

const fn = function foo(p1, ..., pn) {
  // ...
}
  1. Method definitions
const methods = {
  foo(p1, ..., pn) {
    // ...
  }
}
